title: Devs on Tape x Kscope25: The Inspiring Journey of Edward Roske
description: In-depth interview covering Edward's career from founding interRel at 22 through AI ventures at Caprus and Dawnward, plus the intersection of AI, EPM, and data privacy.

title: GenAI in the Wild: An Interview with Edward Roske
description: Interview covering Edward's use of GenAI tools and his perspective on AI adoption for finance professionals. Part of the Oracle + AI Series.

title: The Top Five Strategic EPM Trends in 2023: ChatGPT, Autonomous, and Beyond
description: Webinar exploring innovative trends in Oracle Cloud EPM including Narrative Reporting, EDM, Account Reconciliation Cloud, and Scenario Modeling.

title: How AI Helps Take Your Power Back: Reclaiming Your Professional Future
description: Presentation on how AI can empower finance executives to reclaim control of their careers and enhance their strategic value.

title: PACE Academic IG: Transitioning from Data to Decisions for Analytics Success
description: Discussion panel with Edward Roske and Dr. Prashanth Southekal on leveraging data and analytics for improved business performance.

title: Kscope14 Interview: Edward Roske (and His Hat)
description: Kevin McGinley interviews Edward at the ODTUG Social Media Lounge. Edward presented sessions on Oracle BI Mobile, Essbase Optimization, and Cutting-Edge Essbase.

title: Edward Roske on Oracle HPCM at MD Anderson Cancer Center
description: Discussing implementing Hyperion Profitability and Cost Management at MD Anderson Cancer Center to determine profitability at the physician level.

title: Real Time BI Ep 014: Edward Roske, Unnecessarily Censored
description: A humorous segment from the Kscope14 livestream broadcast of Real Time BI with Kevin & Stewart.
